entry.title: How to Build Octopress Based on Github
entry.content:
*notice：Make sure that you have installed Git and Ruby1.9.3. Then install rbenv via brew and use rbven to install Ruby. The local deployed environment is in the MAC OS X system under Yosemite 10.10.2.

1.Install Ruby

  • brew install rbenv
  • brew install ruby-build
  • rbenv install 1.9.3-p0
  • rbenv rehash

    • 2.Install Octopress

  • git clone git://github.com/imathis/octopress.git octopress
  • cd octopress
  • gem install bundler
  • rbenv rehash
  • bundle install //will install a lot of package⋯⋯
  • rake install

    • 3.Configure Octopress

    Edit the URL/Title/Subtitle/Author in the file, called “config.yml”.
    You’d better delete all the infomation, related to Twitter, or the Page’ll load slowly because of the GFW。By the same way, delete the words, customized by Google in the file, called “head.html”, which can be found in the path “/source/_includes/custom/head.html”.

    4.Configure Disqus Plugin

    Disqus is a plugin, builded in Octopress, which can be opend in the file “config.yml”. For example: find out the next words,

    #Disqus comments
    
disqus_short_name: 
    
disqus_show_comment_count: false

    then fill in the disqus name and set disqus_show_comment_count true.【The Disqus name should be related to ‘username.github.com’】

    5.Configure Things related to Github

    create ssh in local environment

  • cd ~/.ssh
  • ssh-keygen -t rsa -C X //X is the regist Email in Github
  • when throw out: Enter file in which to save the key (/Users/twer/.ssh/id_rsa): just clik the space button, then click enter
  • when throw out: Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase), just input your Github’s password. Then if it shows: Enter same passphrase again, input your Github’s password again.
  • Open the corresponding file ‘.pub’ int the path ‘~/.ssh’ and copy all the contents in the file.
  • sign in Github, change to Account Settings and SSH Public Keys, Then Add ssh and fill in the contents, copied just now and then save it.

    • Test shh:
    >ssh git@github.com
    Output:

    PTY allocation request failed on channel 0
Hi username! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
Connection to github.com closed.

    It means success!

    6.Deploy The Blog to Github

    利用octopress的一个配置rake任务来自动配置上面创建的仓库：可以让我们方便的部署GitHub page。在终端输入如下命令：
    >rake setup_github_pages
    弹出之后输入格式如：git@github.com:your_username/your_username.github.com.git这样的地址，不要用提示的io【我的是https://github.com/leechenglong/leechenglong.github.io】
    输入以下命令部署博客

  • rake install //是安装Octopress默认主题的
  • rake generate //是生成静态页面的，这两个命令是必须运行的
  • rake preview //本地浏览,在浏览器输入http://localhost:4000/%E6%9D%A5%E8%AE%BF%E9%97%AE
  • rake deploy //发布

    • *注意：
    第一次执行 rake deploy 的时候会报错如下：

    ! [rejected]  master -> master (non-fast-forward)
error: failed to push some refs to 'https://github.com/leechenglong/leechenglong.github.io'
hint: Updates were rejected because the tip of your current branch is behind
hint: its remote counterpart. Merge the remote changes (e.g. 'git pull')
hint: before pushing again.
hint: See the 'Note about fast-forwards' in 'git push --help' for details.

    解决方法是手动进入deploy目录手动强制push一次。

  • cd octopress/deploy
  • git pull origin +master
  • cd ..
  • rake deploy
    • 这样再次执行就不会报错了。

    7.Write Blog

    通过命令rake new_post[“myTitle”]文章生成在目录下的source/_posts目录下。文章是markdown格式的。可以通过Mou软件来编辑保存。 写完后就可以部署更新文章到github上了

  • rake generate
  • git add .
  • git commit -am “Some comment here.”
  • git push origin source
  • rake deploy

    • 新建页面

    你可以在博客源目录下任意地方添加页面，Jekyll会自动拼接，对应的url地址也会根据页面路径自动生成 ，如果要添加 about.markdown ，那么就会生成 site.com/about.html ，如果你想要的url地址是 site.com/about/ ,你需要新建的页面应该是 about/index.markdown .同样的，octopress也有脚本完成这个操作。

  • rake new_page[super-awesome]
    • #creates /source/super-awesome/index.markdown
  • rake new_page[super-awesome/page.html]
    • #creates /source/super-awesome/page.html

    8.Change Theme

    主题位于 octopress/.theme 目录下，默认主题为 classic。 如果需要更改主题（可在网上查找），下载后将主题也放在.theme目录下即可，如果主题名字为blog_theme，那么安装主题时输入以下命令即可：
    >rake install [‘blog_theme’]

    9.Submite codes for backup

    前面提到的deploy只是部署博客代码到github上面，整个octopress并没有提交，为了保证在任何地方随时发布博客，而无需再次详细配置以保证跟github上的最新代码一致，可以将当前octopress的源码存放到github的source分支下：

    git add .
    
git commit -m 'Initial source commit'
    
git push origin source

    Summary

    This article tells us how to setup a blog through Octopress based on Github and introduce the simple ways to post articles or new a page.


    Thanks all the people who make me grow!

entry.title: ReactiveCocoa
entry.content:
什么是ReactiveCocoa

ReactiveCocoa（其简称为RAC）是由Github 开源的一个应用于iOS和OS X开发的新框架。RAC具有函数式编程和响应式编程的特性。它主要吸取了.Net的 Reactive Extensions的设计和实现。

ReactiveCocoa试图解决什么问题

1.传统iOS开发过程中，状态以及状态之间依赖过多的问题
2.传统MVC架构的问题：Controller比较复杂，可测试性差
3.提供统一的消息传递机制

ReactiveCocoa的特点

RAC在应用中大量使用了block，由于Objective-C语言的内存管理是基于引用计数 的，为了避免循环引用问题，在block中如果要引用self，需要使用@weakify(self)和@strongify(self)来避免强引用。另外，在使用时应该注意block的嵌套层数，不恰当的滥用多层嵌套block可能给程序的可维护性带来灾难。
